definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Those who have enrolled in credit-bearing courses offered under CAM will be issued a CAM student identity card.
sentences.chinese: 学分累积制的学员将获发学生证作辨别身份之用。

sentences.english: Please scan your Student ID Card when you enter the hostel.
sentences.chinese: 学生进入宿舍时，须出示学生证。

sentences.english: Free for individual primary and middle school student. (Visitor Ticket of Guangzhou Patriotism Education Base is required. )
sentences.chinese: 中小学生个人凭学生证按票价五折优惠。

sentences.english: My student identity card enables me to travel half-price on trains.
sentences.chinese: 我的学生证使我能够以半价乘火车旅行。

sentences.english: Please report your case to the office of SCS if you loose the ID.
sentences.chinese: 如果学生证丢失请立既通知汉学院办公室。

sentences.english: Please attach the two-sided copies of your student ID card and the school grades report.
sentences.chinese: 请附学生证正反面影本及历年成绩单于后。

sentences.english: The University Hospital provides outpatient care to students with BLCU student I.
sentences.chinese: 留学生患病可凭学生证到校医院就诊。

sentences.english: Not a student has access to the library without showing his student card.
sentences.chinese: 不出示学生证，就进入不了图书馆。

sentences.english: Is that your student ID card in the lost and found case?
sentences.chinese: 失物招领栏里是你的学生证吗？

sentences.english: For registration, students themselves should present their passports or student ID cards, and shan't entrust others to handle on behalf.
sentences.chinese: 注册须本人持护照或学生证完成，不得委托他人代办。

sentences.english: Time had caused the old books to disintegrate into a pile of fragments.
sentences.chinese: 借书时出示学生证或工作证，每次限借一本。

sentences.english: Please bring your student card if you want cheaper tickets.
sentences.chinese: 如果你希望更加优惠的入场券，请带上你的学生证。

sentences.english: Please bring your student or staff card on the day of vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 请于注射当天带备学生证或职员证以便登记。

sentences.english: I lost my student ID card.
All students must use their Student ID Cards to borrow computers at the Circulation Counter.
sentences.chinese: 学生须出示学生证到借书处办理电脑借用手续。

definition: evidence (that one can rely on)/grounds (for believing sth)
not to be charged for admission/(to be admitted) for free/free pass
to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)
